title: Galaxy Digital to tokenize its SEC-registered shares on Solana in key RWA move
summary: Superstate introduced Opening Bell in May to trade SEC-registered stocks on Solana's blockchain, revolutionizing traditional markets.

body.raw:
![Galaxy Digital to tokenize its SEC-registered shares on Solana in key RWA move](https://www.tbstat.com/wp/uploads/2024/07/20240725_Galaxy_News-800x450.jpg)

Superstate introduced Opening Bell in May to trade SEC-registered stocks on Solana's blockchain, revolutionizing traditional markets.

---

**Original Article:** [The Block](https://www.theblock.co/post/369186/galaxy-digital-tokenizes-shares-solana?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss)

*This article was originally published on [The Block](https://www.theblock.co/post/369186/galaxy-digital-tokenizes-shares-solana?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss) and has been curated for our readers.*
